body_html:
So I looked somewhat further (unfortunately, I first did the easy "surely OK" cases that aren't that useful by themselves).
One thing that I wondered about: Given that GCC and Clang support int128, would you accept a full implementation that uses those (MSVC doesn't support int128, so they would miss out without further dependencies)? @apaszke ?

body:
So I looked somewhat further (unfortunately, I first did the easy "surely OK" cases that aren't that useful by themselves). 
One thing that I wondered about: Given that GCC and Clang support int128, would you accept a full implementation that uses those (MSVC doesn't support int128, so they would miss out without further dependencies)? @apaszke ?
